transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Haan sir good afternoon sir maine call aapko sir. Haan ji madam maine bhej diya hai aapka detail madam wo free hoke kar lenge call aapko actually na ek training mein baithe hue hai bas isliye wo abhi tak aayi nahi hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Wo jaise aayenge main aapka karwa dunga actually madam koi bhi concern raise hota hai na to hamari bhi priority hoti hai madam ki jitna jaldi ho sake hum aapka sort out karke apna concern close kare madam hamara bhi TAT chalta hai madam.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Theek hai to aap nishchit rahiye aapke pass call aayegi samne se.
Customer: Nahi nahi suniye na lekin abhi maine dekha to abhi call receive hua hoga jo receive receive call hai aur kal ki jo missed call hai na unke details abhi show off ho rahe hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Haan. To abhi koi issue hai aapko?
Customer: Abhi to filhal nahi hai abhi maine dekha na open karke to abhi khul ke bhi show ho rahe hai.
Executive: To madam ek bar aap apna company ka naam bataiyega kya?
Customer: Shiv Shambhu Agro Solapur.
Executive: Ek minute aapka baat Sandeep se ho raha hoga na?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Aapka baat aapke account manager Sandeep se ho raha tha na? Shiv Shambhu Agro Agency hai na madam?
Customer: Haan Shiv Shambhu Agro.
Executive: Accha sorry madam mujhe accha mujhe ek aur client se meri baat ho rahi thi to mujhe laga unhi ka call aaya hai kya karke actually aapne office number pe call kiya tha aur Sandeep ka number actually busy ja raha hoga is vajah se mere pass call divert ho gaya to actually Sandeep ne aapko call kiya tha madam ki aapne shayad hamare customer care pe call kiya tha theek hai na madam aapko koi issue tha sir to abhi aapka issue hai madam ya issue jo resolve ho gaya aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi solve ho gaya mujhe puchna hai ki mere pehle jo ye the account manager wo Raman Kumar sir the shayad na?
Executive: Nahi aapka jo account handle karenge na madam wo Sandeep hai madam Sandeep Saksena karke aapka account handle karenge.
Customer: Abhi hai wo abhi isse pehle to teen char mahine pehle wo the.
Executive: Ek minute main check kar leta hu madam.
Executive: Haan Raman Kumar Mahato karke tha madam.
Customer: Haan to abhi wo sir kahan pe hai?
Executive: Raman actually company na kariye madam ki kuch better servicing ke liye madam jaise aapka servicing acche se ho better approach ke liye hum account manager aapko madam update karke dete hai matlab change karke dete hai so that aapko jyada se jyada support mil sake madam hamari taraf se bhi.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai theek hai to abhi aapka account problem nahi hai agar kuch laga to main call karungi isi number pe suniye na.
Executive: Haan koi issue nahi aap mere number pe bhi kar sakte hai aap apne account manager Sandeep ke number pe bhi kar sakte hai aur main Sandeep ko bol bhi dunga ki wo aapko whatsapp pe bhi hi likh de aap aap unka number bhi save kar lijiyega theek hai baki mera ek cheez puchna tha aapse madam ki calls wagera bahut jyada miss ho rahi thi matlab October mein bhi accha khasa call aapne 33% answer kiya hai 70% ke aas pass call miss kiya hai September mein bhi aapne call miss kiya hai madam matlab month on month aap call bahut jyada miss kar rahe ho madam.
Customer: October September August September mein main thoda busy thi isliye main call nahi le rahi thi abhi main free hu to abhi main le sakti hu matlab kar rahi hu call le rahi hu.
Executive: Accha accha aur sath hi sath madam jaise ek minute.
Executive: Ek minute main bata raha hu aapko.
Executive: Agar aap busy rehte hai na madam to mera ek hamara ek suggestion hota hai ki madam agar aap possible ho to kisi employee ka bhi number aap apna add kar sakte ho so that agar aap busy ho to unke pass call jaye buyer ka to wo baat kar le real time pe real time pe buyer se baat hoti hai madam to ek hota hai ki conversion ka.
Customer: Situation waisi thi abhi kuch nahi abhi main le sakti hu.
Executive: Accha accha chaliye theek hai acchi baat hai madam but isko thoda sa kijiyega ki aur baki Raman kya Raman se aapka TrustSeal service ka bhi discussion hua tha na madam?
Customer: Haan haan lekin wo service mujhe hamare nahi karna hai karke.
Executive: Accha accha to abhi usko mana usko nahi karna abhi same service hi continue karna hai aapko?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Nahi maine isliye aapko pucha madam kyunki maine dekha ki Raman ka update tha TrustSeal ko leke madam aur company abhi kya kar rahi hai madam jo bhi hamare purane client hai na agar TrustSeal do saal ka plan karte ho madam to approx two years ke amount mein hi madam hum aapko three years ki service de rahe hai madam aur plus two months extra karke bhi de rahe hai.
Customer: Dekhenge wo agli bar jab renewal karna hoga na tab.
Executive: Accha accha kyunki February mein hi aapka renewal hai hai na February mein aapka renewal hai to abhi account aapka pre renewal stage pe bhi run kar raha hai madam to better opportunity tha aapke pass ki agar aap approx two years ke paisa mein three years ki service mil rahi hai madam isse jyada aapko kya chahiye aap bataiye do saal ke hamare TrustSeal ka.
Customer: Wo abhi jab renewal karna hai na tab dekhenge thoda business to aane do yahan se.
Executive: Accha chaliye theek hai koi issue nahi hai madam.
Executive: Baki agar aapka permission ho madam to isko main close karwa sakta hu ticket ko?
Customer: Kis kisko?
Executive: Jaise aap hamare customer care pe call karte ho na to ek concern open ho jata hai madam hai na to usi regarding aapka haan usko main agar aapka permission ho to karwa sakta hu madam?
Customer: Yes yes close kijiyega sir.
Executive: Theek hai main usko close kar raha hu madam aur hamara jo discussion hua hai na madam iske regarding ek feedback aayega madam aapke pass aap apna feedback jarur share kijiyega madam.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai sir. Okay madam thank you madam have a nice day madam.
Executive: Thank you sir IndiaMART ke liye madam bol raha tha aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's missed call details were not showing.

- Enquired about previous account manager, Raman Kumar.

- Inquired about the high number of missed calls.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the issue was resolved.

- Clarified Sandeep Saksena is current account manager.

- Explained the benefits of TrustSeal service.

- Agreed to close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform Sandeep to message on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, missed calls, trustseal, renewal
